item.title: 索迪斯下调 2025 年指导计划，原因是北美地区增长放缓
item.description: 法国餐饮企业索迪斯周四下调了 2025 年的业绩预期，理由是北美地区的有机增长速度低于预期。【原文：French food caterer Sodexo lowered its 2025 guidance on Thursday, citing slower than expected organic growth in North America.】

item.title: 索迪斯下调 2025 年指导计划，原因是北美地区增长放缓
item.description: 法国餐饮企业索迪斯周四下调了 2025 年的业绩预期，理由是北美地区的有机增长速度低于预期。【原文：French food caterer Sodexo lowered its 2025 guidance on Thursday, citing slower than expected organic growth in North America.】

item.title: 市场：特朗普如何推动亚洲从美国走向多元化
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税和其他政策让亚洲的一些金融家和官员预测，二战后的经济秩序将被重塑，这导致亚洲急需摆脱美国，实现多元化。但事实证明这并不容易。【原文：President Donald Trump's tariffs and other policies have some financiers and officials in Asia predicting the remaking of the post-World War II economic order, leading to an urgent quest to diversify away from America. But it's not proving to be easy.】

item.title: 贝莱德押注消费者推动力，追逐欧洲储蓄者
item.description: 贝莱德的一位高管表示，贝莱德正致力于扩大以零售为重点的产品范围，包括更多的交易所交易基金，以吸引新一代欧洲人参与投资，并试图在竞争中击败正在慢慢站稳脚跟的本土竞争对手。【原文：BlackRock is betting on an expanded range of retail-focused products, including more exchange-traded funds, to attract a new generation of Europeans into investing, an executive said, as it tries to outcompete local rivals slowly gaining ground.】

item.title: 育碧《刺客信条：阴影》在 Steam 上首次亮相，获得 "基本好评
item.description: 本周四，育碧大作《刺客信条》系列的最新作品在 Steam 上发布约两小时后，根据 359 条用户评论获得了 "基本好评 "的评价，其中 79% 为好评。【原文：The newest instalment in Ubisoft's blockbuster "Assassin's Creed" franchise received a "mostly positive" rating on Steam based on 359 user reviews, with 79% of them being positive, about two hours after its launch on the game distribution platform on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞标央行接力棒传向欧洲
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 阿卡萨航空公司在波音飞机交付延迟和飞行员闲置问题上的挣扎内幕
item.description: 印度最新成立的航空公司阿卡萨航空公司（Akasa Air）内部正在产生挫折感，高层管理人员私下批评波音公司推迟交付飞机，并争相安抚数百名焦虑的飞行员，因为他们仍然没有工作。【原文：Frustration is building inside India's newest airline, Akasa Air, with top executives privately criticising Boeing for delayed plane deliveries and scrambling to assuage hundreds of anxious pilots who remain idle without work.】

item.title: 消息人士称，巴西总统卢拉访问越南，金砖国家、飞机和牛肉成为焦点
item.description: 据知情人士透露，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦将于下周访问越南，并将带来一个商业代表团，其中包括巴西航空工业公司和食品巨头 JBS 的高管。【原文：Brazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva will visit Vietnam next week, bringing with him a business delegation including executives from planemaker Embraer and food giant JBS that are both in talks for possible deals in the Southeast Asian country, sources said.】

item.title: 美联储的平衡之举为受关税打击的投资者提供了喘息机会
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）的观望态度给投资者带来了一些安慰，因为与关税相关的动荡对市场和经济构成了威胁。【原文：Investors are taking some comfort from the U.S. Federal Reserve's wait-and-see approach, after being rattled by tariff-related turmoil that poses a threat to markets and the economy.】

item.title: 微软马来西亚公司将于 2025 年第二季度推出三个数据中心
item.description: 在宣布向东南亚国家投资 22 亿美元近一年后，微软公司周四表示，将于今年年中在马来西亚推出首个云计算地区，并建立三个数据中心。【原文：Microsoft will launch its first cloud region in Malaysia with three data centres by mid-year, the tech company said on Thursday, nearly a year after it announced a $2.2 billion investment in the Southeast Asian country.】

item.title: 高管女儿泄露个人信息后，中国百度否认数据泄露
item.description: 中国搜索巨头百度周三否认了其遭受内部数据泄露的指控，因为该公司一名高管的未成年女儿在网上发布了其他互联网用户的个人信息，引发了一场争议。【原文：Chinese search giant Baidu on Wednesday denied allegations it had suffered an internal data breach after a top executive's teenage daughter posted personal details of other internet users online, sparking a controversy.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：特朗普考虑延长雪佛龙在委内瑞拉的石油开采许可
item.description: 华尔街日报》周四援引熟悉讨论情况的人士的话报道称，特朗普政府正在考虑延长雪佛龙公司在委内瑞拉的石油开采许可，并对与南美国家有业务往来的其他国家实施经济处罚。【原文：The Trump administration is considering a plan to extend Chevron's license to pump oil in Venezuela and impose financial penalties on other countries that do business with the South American nation, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 中国的 "黄金爱马仕 "在高端商品需求低迷的情况下仍大放异彩
item.description: 近十年前，Vivian Wang 从老铺黄金公司购买了一枚雕龙金牌，但直到去年她的社交媒体上出现了这枚金牌，她才忘记了这个品牌。【原文：Vivian Wang bought a gold medallion decorated with a carved dragon from Laopu Gold nearly a decade ago, but forgot about the brand until last year when it appeared all over her social media feeds.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Couche-Tard、Seven & i 在 3 月底前征求美国商店的意向
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，日本 Seven & i 公司和加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司美国分店剥离方案的潜在买家必须在 3 月底之前表达他们的兴趣，并表明他们能够克服反垄断方面的顾虑，因为有关可能合并的谈判仍在继续。【原文：Potential buyers for a divestiture package of Japan's Seven & i and Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard's U.S. stores have until the end of March to express their interest and show they can overcome antitrust concerns as talks over a possible merger continue, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英伟达将在四年内投资数十亿美元在美国生产芯片
item.description: Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋周三告诉《金融时报》，Nvidia 计划在未来四年向美国制造的芯片和电子产品投资数千亿美元。【原文：Nvidia plans to invest hundreds of billions of dollars in U.S.-made chips and electronics over the next four years, CEO Jensen Huang told the Financial Times on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据 Breitbart 报道，特朗普称相信印度将降低对美国的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三在接受布赖特巴特新闻（Breitbart News）采访时表示，他相信印度很可能会降低对美国商品征收的关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump told Breitbart News in an interview on Wednesday that he believes India will probably be lowering the tariffs it imposes on American goods.】

item.title: 尽管美联储持乐观态度，中国股市下滑仍阻碍亚洲市场发展
item.description: 尽管美联储仍有可能在今年降息两次的前景提振了投资者的情绪，但周四亚洲股市仍受到中国市场疲软的拖累，难以在华尔街反弹的基础上再接再厉。【原文：Asia shares were hobbled by weakness in Chinese markets on Thursday and struggled to build on Wall Street's rally, even as investor sentiment was lifted by the prospect that the Federal Reserve could still deliver two rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 美联储发出 2025 年两次降息信号，黄金攀升至历史新高
item.description: 由于美联储暗示今年可能降息两次，黄金周四升至历史新高，在持续的地缘政治和经济困境中增强了金银的吸引力。【原文：Gold rose to an all-time high on Thursday as the Federal Reserve hinted at two possible interest rate cuts this year, bolstering bullion's appeal amid ongoing geopolitical and economic woes.】

item.title: 特朗普称美联储最好在关税向经济 "过渡 "时降息
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三表示，美联储最好在 "美国关税开始向经济过渡（放松！）之际 "降息，当天美联储维持利率不变。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday said the Federal Reserve would be better off cutting rates "as U.S. tariffs start to transition (ease!) their way into the economy", on the day the central bank kept rates unchanged.】

item.title: 油价因美国数据和中东紧张局势而上涨
item.description: 周四早盘，油价因美国燃料库存下降和中东紧张局势加剧而上涨。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trading on Thursday on a decline in U.S. fuel inventories and a ratchetting up of tensions in the Middle East.】

item.title: 巴拿马港口交易风波愈演愈烈，长江和记将公布盈利报告
item.description: 长江和记将于本周四公布其 2024 年财务业绩，香港最有实力的企业集团之一正日益卷入一场政治争论，争论的焦点是将其港口业务出售给贝莱德（BlackRock）牵头的财团。【原文：CK Hutchison is set to release its 2024 financial results on Thursday with one of Hong Kong's most powerful conglomerates increasingly embroiled in a political row over the sale of its ports business to a BlackRock-led consortium.】

item.title: 美联储通过降息预测安抚市场神经，美元随之震荡
item.description: 在美联储表示今年晚些时候可能降息后，美元周四走软，即使美国关税的不确定性也对美元构成了压力，而英镑则在英国央行政策决定前创下了四个月来的新高。【原文：The dollar was softer on Thursday after the Federal Reserve indicated interest rate cuts were likely later this year even as uncertainty around U.S. tariffs weighed, while the pound hit a four-month high ahead of the Bank of England's policy decision.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，建筑产品分销商 QXO 以 110 亿美元成交 Beacon Roofing
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，建筑产品分销商 QXO 与 Beacon Roofing Supply 签订协议，对 Beacon 的估值约为 77 亿美元，包括债务在内约为 110 亿美元。【原文：Building-products distributor QXO signed a deal for Beacon Roofing Supply , valuing Beacon at roughly $7.7 billion, or $11 billion including debt, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 软银集团将以 65 亿美元收购 Ampere Computing 公司
item.description: 软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp）周三表示，将以全现金交易方式收购领先的独立芯片设计公司 Ampere Computing，交易价值为 65 亿美元。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp said on Wednesday it will acquire Ampere Computing, a leading independent silicon design company, in an all-cash transaction valued at $6.5 billion.】

item.title: 澳大利亚支持 Vocus 以 33 亿美元收购 TPG Telecom 的光纤和固定资产
item.description: 澳大利亚竞争监管机构周四批准了电信公司 Vocus 以 52.5 亿澳元（33.4 亿美元）收购当地竞争对手 TPG Telecom 的企业、政府和批发固定业务及光纤网络资产的交易。【原文：Australia's competition watchdog on Thursday approved telco Vocus' A$5.25 billion ($3.34 billion) takeover of local rival TPG Telecom's enterprise, government and wholesale fixed business and fibre network assets.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：雪佛龙首席执行官寻求更多时间结束委内瑞拉业务
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道，美国石油巨头雪佛龙公司（Chevron）正在游说华盛顿允许其有更多的时间来结束在委内瑞拉的业务。【原文：U.S. oil giant Chevron is lobbying Washington to allow more time to wind down its operations in Venezuela, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔：关税将推迟通胀进程，评估影响为时尚早
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提高关税将推迟今年在降低通胀方面取得的进展，但美联储的基本判断是，与关税相关的价格影响将是短暂的，很快就会在经济中发挥作用。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Wednesday that President Donald Trump's tariff increases would delay progress in bringing down inflation this year, but the Fed's base case is that tariff-related price impacts will be transitory, working through the economy quickly.】

item.title: 保诚集团 2024 年利润增长，得益于亚非增长强劲和更多的代理商
item.description: 英国保诚集团（Prudential PLC）周四公布，2024 财年调整后税前营业利润增长，原因是这家专注于亚洲的保险公司受益于亚洲和非洲各业务部门的强劲表现。【原文：Prudential PLC , posted a rise in adjusted operating profit before tax for fiscal 2024 on Thursday, as the Asia-focused insurer benefited from strong performance across business segments in Asia and Africa.】

item.title: 陪审团称，绿色和平组织必须就 "站岩 "抗议活动向管道公司赔偿近 6.67 亿美元
item.description: 陪审团周三表示，绿色和平组织必须向一家总部位于得克萨斯州的管道公司支付近 6.67 亿美元的赔偿金，因为该环保倡导组织在 2016-2017 年抗议北达科他州达科他输油管道（Dakota Access Pipeline）的活动中扮演了重要角色。【原文：Greenpeace must pay a Texas-based pipeline company nearly $667 million in damages for the environmental advocacy group’s role in 2016-2017 protests against the Dakota Access Pipeline in North Dakota, a jury said Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国司法部称丰田子公司日野汽车因排放欺诈被罚 16 亿美元
item.description: 美国司法部周三在一份声明中说，日本汽车制造商丰田公司的一家子公司在承认参与多年的排放欺诈计划后，将面临 16 亿美元的处罚。【原文：A subsidiary of Japanese carmaker Toyota faces $1.6 billion in penalties after pleading guilty to having engaged in a multi-year emissions fraud scheme, the U.S. Justice Department said in a statement on Wednesday.】
